list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the hindmost part of an animal, especially when prolonged beyond the rest of the body, such as the flexible extension of the backbone in a vertebrate, the feathers at the hind end of a bird, or a terminal appendage in an insect.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the dog's tail began to wag frantically
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đuôi chó bắt đầu điên cuồng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing resembling an animal's tail in its shape or position, typically something extending downward or outward at the end of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the trailed tail of a capital Q
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đuôi đuôi của thủ đô Q

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the end of a long train or line of people or vehicles.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an armored truck at the tail of the convoy
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chiếc xe tải bọc thép ở đuôi của đoàn xe

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person secretly following another to observe their movements.
the reverse side of a coin (used when tossing a coin).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the chances of heads and tails in the long run are equal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cơ hội của đầu và đuôi trong thời gian dài bằng nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: limitation of ownership, especially of an estate or title limited to a person and their heirs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the land was held in tail general
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vùng đất được tổ chức ở Đuôi nói chung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: follow and observe (someone) closely, especially in secret.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a flock of paparazzi had tailed them all over Paris
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một đàn Paparazzi đã đặt đuôi tất cả qua Paris
